original_title: Liquor shops close tomorrow (13) and day after (14) , for Sinhala and Tamil new year
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Excise Department says that liquor shops across the island will be closed tomorrow (13) and the day after (14) in view of the Sinhala and Tamil New Year.
In a statement, the department says that a special operation is underway to conduct raids to search for the illegal sale of liquor.
The department says that people can provide information regarding excise tax offenses to the special telephone number 1913.
